name: Orange Seal VersaValve 48mm Valve Stem
description: Say goodbye to clogged-up valves and hello to a perfect seal. The VersaValve's internal diameter is oversized to improve the airflow and make tire inflation a breeze. It's also easier to clean out the insides when needed.Includes 2 different gasket profiles to ensure a perfect fit between your rim and the valve.Oversized internal valve diameter boosts airflow and reduces the odds of clogging.Box wrench-compatible valve nut helps keep the system sealed.In the bag: 2 valve stems, 2 endcaps, 4 valve cores, 4 valve-rim gaskets, 2 o-rings, 2 valve nuts, and 1 valve core removal tool.Valve length is 48mm.
